body: Indeed, that's a bug. Can you try changing this line https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/parallel/_functions.py#L16 to ```ctx.input_device = 0``` and check if it fixes your issue? If you've installed pytorch with ```setup.py build develop``` changing that file in your source tree should be enough, otherwise, if you don't want to rebuild for a single line change you'd have to find it in the install trees.
